description: AI generation hints for UX Builder components. Use this mapping when generating Next.js/React code from wireframe JSON.

layoutInstructions.positioning: CRITICAL: Each component in JSON has x, y, w, h coordinates. Use these for exact positioning!
layoutInstructions.implementation: Wrap each component in: <div className='grid grid-cols-12 gap-4'><div className='col-start-{x+1} col-span-{w}'>

examples.centered10: x:1, w:10 → <div className='col-start-2 col-span-10'> (1 col padding each side)
examples.centered8: x:2, w:8 → <div className='col-start-3 col-span-8'> (2 cols padding each side)
examples.centered6: x:3, w:6 → <div className='col-start-4 col-span-6'> (3 cols padding each side)

layoutInstructions.maxWidth: Use max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 for main container
layoutInstructions.verticalSpacing: Use component's h (height) value for min-height calculation: h * 50px (rowHeight from metadata)

aiHints.logo: Company logo - render as text or image component with alt text
aiHints.navigation: Generate 4-5 navigation links (e.g., Home, About, Services, Contact)
aiHints.responsive: Mobile: Show hamburger menu, Desktop: Show full navigation

aiHints.logo: Brand logo with link to homepage
aiHints.navigation: Main category links (e.g., Shop, New Arrivals, Sale)
aiHints.actions: Shopping cart icon with count badge, user account icon
aiHints.responsive: Mobile: Hamburger + cart icon, Desktop: Full nav + search + icons

aiHints.navigation: Feature-focused links (e.g., Features, Pricing, Docs, Blog)
aiHints.actions: Login and Sign Up buttons with distinct styling
aiHints.responsive: Maintain CTA visibility on all screen sizes

aiHints.headline: Generate 1-2 line compelling headline (H1), focus on value proposition
aiHints.subheading: 2-3 lines supporting text (p or H2), explain benefits or features
aiHints.background: If hasImageBackground: Use hero image (1920x1080), else: gradient or solid color
aiHints.alignment: left: Text-heavy, professional | center: Minimal, impactful | right: Creative, asymmetric
aiHints.content: Tailor messaging to the pageType and industry from metadata

HeroWithImage.description: Hero section with side-by-side image and content

aiHints.headline: Compelling 1-2 line headline
aiHints.imagePosition: left: Image first (F-pattern) | right: Content first (visual hierarchy)

ProductList.description: Grid or list of product cards

aiHints.products: Generate array of product objects with: { name, price, description, image, category }
aiHints.images: Product images 400x400, use placeholder services like Unsplash (e.g., /400x400/?product)
aiHints.pricing: Format: $XX.XX, use realistic prices for industry
aiHints.cta: 'Add to Cart' for e-commerce, 'Learn More' for services, 'View Details' for general
aiHints.layout: grid: Cards in responsive grid | list: Horizontal cards with more details

aiHints.title: Product name (H3 or strong)
aiHints.description: 1-2 line product description (optional in grid view)
aiHints.variant: grid: Compact, vertical | list: Expanded, horizontal with more details

aiHints.images: Product image gallery with 1 main image (800x800) and 4 thumbnails
aiHints.title: Full product name (H1)
aiHints.rating: Star rating out of 5 with review count
aiHints.actions: Primary: 'Add to Cart', Secondary: 'Add to Wishlist' or 'Compare'

aiHints.fields: Generate form with: Name (required), Email (required, validated), Subject, Message (textarea)
aiHints.layout: standard: Centered form | withInfo: Form + contact details (phone, email, address)
aiHints.a11y: Include proper labels, ARIA attributes, and focus management

FooterPattern.description: Site footer with links and info

aiHints.structure: Logo on left, 3 link columns in center, subscribe section on right, copyright at bottom
aiHints.logo: Small logo placeholder (gray rectangle with border)
aiHints.linkColumns: 3 columns, each with: gray header bar (column title) + 4 blue link placeholders below
aiHints.newsletter: Input field (white with border) + button (gray) side by side
aiHints.social: 4 circular gray icons for social links
aiHints.copyright: Gray bar centered at bottom (below horizontal line separator)
aiHints.layout: Horizontal flex layout with gaps, border-top separator
aiHints.wireframeStyle: Use placeholder rectangles/circles, not actual text - matches wireframe aesthetic

aiHints.implementation: Image with alt text or SVG, wrapped in link to homepage
aiHints.fallback: If no image: Use company name in styled text

aiHints.items: Generate navigation items based on pageType (e.g., Shop, Collections, About)
aiHints.variant: simple: Text links | withDropdown: Include dropdown menus | withButton: Include CTA button
aiHints.responsive: Mobile: Hamburger menu | Desktop: Horizontal menu

aiHints.text: Action-oriented text (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Learn More', 'Add to Cart')
aiHints.variant: primary: Filled, high contrast | secondary: Outlined or ghost
solid: Background color | image: Background image with overlay
aiHints.content: Can contain any combination of text, images, buttons
aiHints.use: For features, team members, blog posts, testimonials

aiHints.fields: Generate appropriate input fields based on context
aiHints.labels: Show/hide field labels based on showLabels prop
aiHints.submit: Form submit button with loading state

aiHints.alt: Generate descriptive alt text for accessibility
aiHints.optimization: Use Next.js Image component for optimization

homepage.contentStrategy: Focus on value proposition, key features, and clear calls-to-action

product-listing.contentStrategy: Product discovery, filtering, sorting, quick view

product-detail.contentStrategy: Detailed product info, high-quality images, social proof, upsells

landing-page.contentStrategy: Single focused goal, remove navigation distractions, strong CTAs

contact.contentStrategy: Multiple contact methods, form, location, business hours

about.contentStrategy: Company story, team members, mission/values, trust signals

generatePromptTemplate: Create a Next.js 14 page using App Router and TypeScript based on this wireframe JSON. Use Tailwind CSS for styling. Generate realistic placeholder content appropriate for the {industry} industry. All images should use placeholder services. Create reusable components following Next.js best practices. Include proper TypeScript types, accessibility features, and responsive design. The page should be production-ready with proper SEO meta tags.
